page.title: 06Local Facilities II
page.content:
The area has many regular services which most people tend to take for granted, but would be missed if they were withdrawn.
Castle Combe and Chippenham Dairies deliver milk to all households 6 days a week. The General Stores deliver newspapers 7 days a week. The District Council has a regular weekly refuse collection service, whereby they will remove domestic and garden rubbish. A mobile library visits the area once a fortnight. The postman drives out from Chippenham 6 days a week to deliver mail.
There are two public telephones locally, one in Sutton Benger High Street, the other at Draycot Corner.
